rules.description: Backslash to Ctrl, Backslash if alone
Enter set `do_modify_action` to `1` when pressed, Enter if alone
CapsLock set `do_modify_action` to `1` when pressed, Esc if press alone
B to Backspace, D to Delete, A to Home, E to End, U to PageUp, Y to PageDown (when `do_modify_action` is 1)
T to Ctrl+Alt+T (manualy map to iTerm2 shortcut) (when `do_modify_action` is 1)
W[H,J,K,L,N,P,M,R,A,C,F] to unused key (manualy map to window management) (when `do_modify_action` is 1)
O[A-Z] to Hyper+[A-Z] (manualy map to open app) (when `do_modify_action` is 1)
I[A,V] to change input source language (when `do_modify_action` is 1)
